ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] FW: Lullaby tale
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, with a drum a bard can outrun just about anything in the game starting at around oh... level 5 ;)  As long as they aren t in the slowdown area. At level
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, with a drum a bard can outrun just about anything in the game starting
at around oh... level 5 ;) As long as they aren't in the "slowdown" area.

At level 34 I can outrun anything even with about 50hp if I have a drum
equipped.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 11:00 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] FW: Lullaby tale


> Um. I DID shake the lion patriarch though -- using Lullaby to stop
> him altogether.
>
> And I could outrun him at 16 with Selo's and drums when I wasn't down
> on life.
>
> I made 17 in East Karana last night! I threw my shield down on the ground
> (symbolic of throwing a shield away forever) and headed for Qeynos to
train.
> Curious, I tried wielding two weapons on my way -- it worked! Interesting.
> I conned a highland lion as blue so, with two weapons equipped, I went
> over and attacked it. And I was dual wielding -- I saw both CRUSH and
Slash
> there! And I got two Dual Wield increases! This does need to be trained!
>
> Sarah Heacock sarah@...
> Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos)
/
> Meara, level 16 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
> Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> <lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>
>
>
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> >Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 7:47 AM
>
> >Uhh ;)
> >
> >They're cats ;) Until about level 25-30 you cannot ourun them
> >without drums
> >just because they're cats.
> >
> >Cats, Dogs and Bears already run at Near-SOW speed, Cats run faster,
Bears
> >run slower, Dogs run right at SOW.
> >
> >So, no they don't have SOW but by nature cats are fast ;)
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
> >To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
>
> >> Patriarch's have SOW. I soloed from 18-21 in E karana... Darn things
> >> would not shake off without a drum equipped...
> >> --
> >> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
>
